newsitem.title: USA: U.S. palladium exports, imports for April detailed.
newsitem.headline: U.S. palladium exports, imports for April detailed.

text.p: U.S. palladium imports were valued at $34 million in April, unchanged from March, while imports for the fourth months ending in April totaled $148 million, according to U.S. Commerce Department.
Imports reached $169 million in the same four-month period in 1996, the Department said in statistics released this week.

Palladium exports totaled $26 million in April, up $2 million from the prior month. Cumulative exports in the four months ending in April were valued at $76 million, up from $50 million in the same year-ago period.
The totals include unwrought and semi-manufactured palladium, as well as palladium in powdered form.
